db:abstract.db:para: The QtSensors - QML example demonstrates the QML sensors types in the QtSensors 5 import.

db:article.db:programlisting:
TEMPLATE = app TARGET = qmlqtsensors QT += quick SOURCES = main.cpp
RESOURCES += \ qmlqtsensors.qrc
OTHER_FILES = \ $$files(*.qml) \ components
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/sensors/qmlqtsensors INSTALLS += target
